start.heading: Prove your right to work to an employer
start.info:
This service should only be used by:
  • organisations who have been invited to take part in our trial
  • people working for or applying for jobs with those organisations

This service does not currently provide proof of immigration status - you will still need to show your BRP card to an employer.

Use this service to:

  • view if you can work in the UK and what work you are allowed to do
  • give permission to an employer to view your name, photo and the work you are allowed to do in the UK
  • manage who you have given permission to view your information
start.panel: You will need a Biometric Residence Permit (BRP) to use this service.
start.privacy: By using this service, we will use your data as described in our privacy policy.
